string.text: Heavily Encrypted Documents

"Jxu Pedu ev Qbyudqjyed - Jxu Hebu ev Ucyiiyedi yd Ckjqdj Hufhetksjyed
ro Fhevuiieh Q.R. Ijhkwqjiao
 
 Qrijhqsj
 Qi tucedijhqjut ro Fhevuiieh Xuhcqdd, yj yi ademd jxqj ucyiiyedi sqd fhetksu qhjuvqsji qdt qdecqbyui, mxybu Fhevuiieh Iqaxqhel xqi tucedijhqjut jxqj ucyiiyedi sqd pecryvo bylydw ruydwi. Rkj mxqj qhu jxu uvvusji ev ucyiiyedi ed xkcqd hucqydi?
 
 Huikbji muhu erjqydut ro buqlydw jxu sehfiui ev ijqbauhi sqwut yd efud qyh tkhydw ucyiiyedi. Qvjuh ckbjyfbu juiji, jxu unfuhycudji muhu hufuqjut myjx jxu retyui ev xkcqdeyt ckjqdji iksx qi jxu vqrbut idehai qdt rbeetiksauhi.
 
 Mxqj mu vekdt mqi jxqj qd ucyiiyed, mxud secydw ydje sedjqsj myjx q iaubujqb sehfiu, xqi q sxqdsu je shuqju q "cekbqwu" - q bylydw sqij ev vbuix cqtu vhec qdecqbeki fxudecudq, mxysx jxud huqdycqjui jxu reto. Cekbqwui sqd jqau jxu vehc ev idehai, rbeetiksauhi, pecryvyut xkcqdi qi mubb qi iuucydwbo dehcqb xkcqdi, qdt yd qbb sqiui sqd ru tyijydwkyixut vhec jxuyh jhkbo bylydw sekdjuhfqhji ro jxuyh tuqjxbo whuo fqbbeh. Cekbqwui mxe ceij huiucrbut dehcqb xkcqdi unxyryjut jxu qrybyjo je secckdysqju rkj hugkyhut iutqjyed qi jxuo ydlqhyqrbo tyifbqout unjhucu fqhqdeyq, tubkiyedi, eh q tuiyhu je uisqfu ydje jxu kdademd.
 
 Sedsbkiyed: q fejudjyqb unfbqdqjyed veh hufhetksjyed qcedw jxu kdyiun ideha secckdyjyui xqi ruud erjqydut. Vkhjxuhcehu, jxuhu yi dem q isyudjyvys hqjyedqbu veh eriuhlydw fhefuh rkhyqb skijeci yd jxu Pedu, buij mu sxeeiu je vuut yji tqdwuhi ydijuqt."
 cc -2018"
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Locked Case

A sturdy, reinforced container sealed shut, its contents unknown without the proper key or tools to crack it open.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Encrypted PDA

A personal digital assistant protected by advanced encryption, likely containing valuable data.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Psy-helmet (Uncalibrated)

A prototype helmet designed to shield the wearer from psi-emissions, though without proper calibration, its effectiveness is unreliable and may even amplify hallucinations or headaches. In its current state, it's more of a gamble than true protection.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Psy-helmet (Calibrated)

A fully adjusted prototype Psy-helmet designed to protect against the Zone’s psi-emissions, significantly reducing the risk of psychic attacks. Calibrated to the wearer’s brain patterns, it offers vital protection when approaching areas like the Brain Scorcher or other psi-active zones.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Doctor's Key

A key with 'Hotel Polissya – Room 26' engraved on the side.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item

A key with 'Hotel Polissya – Room 26' engraved on the side.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Strelok's Manuscript

A worn manuscript in leather binding, written by Strelok. It might explain some of the Zone's secrets.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Doctor's Notes

Some notes about old men's conspiracy theories.
 
 There are rumors that the Agroprom Institute was used as a front for an unofficial lab in the years preceding the 2006 accident. This lab hosted a number of very unusual experiments. The traders have dug up a lot of information about these laboratories.
 I met with the Barkeep. He says he sent Duty scouts to get into the underground vaults of the Dark Valley, called X-18, but they disappeared. There are other rumors regarding a 'psi-brain' mechanism. The whole neighborhood in Yantar is under the influence of that device. It zombified everyone who came within range. There is another mechanism in the Red Forest radar underground, called lab X-19. That is likely to be the Brain Scorcher.
 There is evidence to suggest that the presence of the Brain Scorcher intentionally blocks the road to the North, but no one knows exactly what it is. The Barkeep believes that the Brain Scorcher is man-made, and these mechanisms are not always operating at full strength. He thinks there are periods when their power is lowered to cool down the apparatus. It's time to visit all the underground laboratories in the Zone and find out what kind of secrets they are hiding. I'm too old for this shit. I wish Strelok was still around...
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Decoder

A powerful electronic lock-pick. It seems to have been created with a specific electronic lock in mind and cannot be used for anything else.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item

The manuscript contains a brief report detailing how Fang and Strelok infiltrated a hidden laboratory and the journey they took to reach it. It mentions a significant Monolith presence in and around the Chernobyl NPP, particularly beneath the concrete sarcophagus, suggesting it could be their main base of operations, possibly hiding something of importance. Further along, the report describes the discovery of another laboratory further north, beneath the generators, though they were unable to gain access at the time due to the need for a special decoder.\n \n
Military Documents

A fireproof briefcase containing military documents and reports on investigations performed near Agroprom. The reports talk in detail about how machinery and equipment have gone missing from the institute and how the results of the investigations on their whereabouts were apparently falsified.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Biology Research Report

The report details the study of biological samples sent from lab X-18. The samples were subjected to informational field effects of varying intensities. The report meticulously describes the mutation of living beings following exposure to emissions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Psy Research Documents

The documents refer to the discovery that living creatures are able to generate directed psy-emissions and how a large biological field emitting "brain" was grown as part of the research conducted in lab X-16.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Rainbow Emitter Documents

The documents describe the technical characteristics of an antenna and how they deviated from their planned designs. There is a note on the reverse side which indicates that these documents were prepared in lab X-19.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Order of Transfer

The documents refer to the transfer of the research team and all materials to another laboratory far to the north and how it will be used to research matters relating to the influence of the noosphere. To enter the lab, the date of the accident must be used as a code. (ddmmyyyy)
 The research team comprised: N.A. Lebedev, E.F. Kalancha and V.I. Suslov.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Experiment Notebook

The notebook contains a detailed description of an experiment assessing a psi-field's effect on an object in another hemisphere. A group of scientists in the Caribbean received the signal but it was altered in a strange way, as though corrected by someone. Though, a possible explanation is that the noosphere theory is correct and the changes were made by the noosphere.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Prototype Weapon Report

Documents describing the operating mechanism and main technical characteristics of a more advanced electromagnetic device.
 There is a note inside the documents which reads: 'Documents must be returned to the central laboratory at X-8. I will be busy, so deliver them yourself. — N. Lebedev'.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Package

The contents of this package are unknown.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Anomalous Activity Scanner

This case combines an artefact detector, a battery and a powerful transmitter. The device will scan anomalies to determine the number and type of artefacts that appear. All of this information will be automatically relayed to the scientists' bunker.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Worn Notebook

A notebook, likely owned by Strelok. It describes in detail how to get into an underground complex called X-18.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Flight Recorder

A flight data recorder, or "black box". Flight recorders are used to record the status of internal systems and crew conversations and can provide vital information in the event of an accident. In the Zone, stalker and military personnel alike are interested in these devices.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
PDA

A PDA containing information on routes between different areas.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Antenna Installation Documents

The documents refer to what seems to be a massive radar installation. Most likely the structure holding the Brain Scorcher.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Biological Research

A set of old papers that refer to experiments done on rats and other animals.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Experiment Report: B0-D4

Old documents that refer to an experiment related to psy-wave resonance.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Communication Log / 21.03.2006

A printed transcription of a radio transmission between scientist groups from the institute.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Agroprom Institute Documentation

A bunch of notes, pictures and a single marked map regarding Agroprom. Probably written by Strelok.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Transportation Records

These documents refer to old records of transporting mechanical equipment and tools to the factory in Jupiter. It also includes geometric schemes for the tunnels toward the eastern side.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Experimentation (11.04.2005)

This log documents the results of an experiment from years ago regarding new types of psy-emitters.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Experimentation (24.09.2005)

This log documents the results of an experiment from years ago regarding psy-waves applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
Experimentation (02.05.2006)

This log documents the results of a biological experiment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item
